data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING HELD ON 11.02.2023
data.news_body:
The Board at its meeting held today on Saturday, 11th February, 2023, has taken on record:

- the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended on 31st December, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditors thereon; and

- the purchase of land parcel admeasuring 1.30 Lakhs square meters situated at Tal. Anand, Dist. Anand, Gujarat which is proposed to be utilized for setting up of a manufacturing facility of Glass Lined and other equipment, the plans for which are under consideration.
